original_text: That is why I am writing these things to you now, while I am away from you. Then, when I arrive, I will not need to be angry with you. I will not have to use my authority to punish you. The Lord gave that authority to me to help you to become stronger as believers. He did not give it to me so that I could destroy you.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 떠나 있을 때에 이렇게 쓰는 것은 대면할 때에 주께서 너희를 넘어뜨리려 하지 않고 세우려 하여 내게 주신 그 권한을 따라 엄하지 않게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: That is why I am writing these things to you now
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 지금 너희에게 이것들을 쓰고 있는 것이다

sentences.original_text: while I am away from you
I will not need to be angry with you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게 화낼 필요가 없을 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will not have to use my authority to punish you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희를 벌하기 위해 내 권위를 사용할 필요가 없을 것이다

sentences.original_text: The Lord gave that authority to me
to help you to become stronger as believers
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 믿는 자로서 더 강해지도록 돕기 위해서이다

sentences.original_text: He did not give it to me so that I could destroy you
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서는 내가 너희를 파괴하도록 그것을 주신 것이 아니다
